channel.title: cx_Freeze on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in cx_Freeze on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Make upgradeable msi file with cx_Freeze
item.description: MSI's Upgrade Code is a unique code for managing your application. If this is not specified, you will have to manually reinstall the package after each upgrade. Generate UUID (GUID) for # Upgrade Code Run the following command in the Python interpreter. import uuid str(uuid.uuid3(uuid.NAMESPACE_DNS,'appname.orgname.org')).upper() *Please replace’appname.orgname.org’ with an appropriate one. *There are several other methods (http://docs.python.jp/3.4/library/uuid.html) Then, a unique ID such as ‘3F2504E0-4F89-11D3-9A0C-0305E82C3301’ is generated, so make a note of it.
